panels.description:
Status number to state mapping:

1 `ONLINE`
2 `SHUNNED`
3 `OFFLINE_SOFT`
4 `OFFLINE_HARD`

For status details, see the [description](https://github.com/sysown/proxysql/blob/master/doc/admin_tables.md#mysql_servers).
